Commenti.Body: 1946: Margret Zimmermann balancing on a tightrope over the ruins of Cologne in which was then in the British occupation zone in Germany [1600x1178]
This must be a fake picture...the tightrope is going nowhere. The tightrope is not attached to anything in one direction.
1946: Margret Zimmermann balancing on a tightrope over the ruins of Cologne in which was then in the British occupation zone in Germany [1600x1178]
It is a very thin line which makes it very light so I assume it simply floats in the air. Case closed.
